creditline:
Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Harrison R. Johnston, Jr., by exchange and 
the Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
marks:
Inscription

Signed and dated with monogram
provenance: H. S. Theobald (L. 1375), sold at Theobald sale in Stuttgart by Gutekunst in 1910; Stefan Jancsy (L. suppl. 15 2g d, twice, on verso); another collector's mark (') in pencil, "S.R."
title: Holy Family with Anna and Joachim Under a Tree
